DataSource.Query: SELECT sales.quotations.quotation_id, sales.quotations.transaction_timestamp, sales.quotations.value_date, account.get_name_by_user_id(sales.quotations.user_id) AS entered_by, core.get_office_name_by_office_id(sales.quotations.office_id) AS office_name, sales.quotations.terms, sales.quotations.internal_memo, inventory.get_customer_name_by_customer_id(sales.quotations.customer_id) AS customer_name FROM sales.quotations WHERE sales.quotations.quotation_id = @quotation_id;

SELECT sales.quotation_details.item_id, inventory.items.item_code, inventory.items.item_name, sales.quotation_details.price, sales.quotation_details.quantity, inventory.get_unit_name_by_unit_id(sales.quotation_details.unit_id) AS unit, sales.quotation_details.price * sales.quotation_details.quantity AS amount, sales.quotation_details.discount_rate, ROUND( ( (sales.quotation_details.price) * ((sales.quotation_details.discount_rate)/100) * sales.quotation_details.quantity) , 4) AS discount, sales.quotation_details.tax, ROUND( ( (sales.quotation_details.price * sales.quotation_details.quantity) * ((100 - sales.quotation_details.discount_rate)/100)) , 4) + sales.quotation_details.tax AS total FROM sales.quotation_details INNER JOIN inventory.items ON inventory.items.item_id = sales.quotation_details.item_id WHERE sales.quotation_details.quotation_id = @quotation_id ORDER BY sales.quotation_details.quotation_detail_id;
